dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Haah... Please hold that laughter. Does it look like I wore this because I liked it?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: It's morning, and I already feel like ass... Oh, sorry, did you hear that? But... it really is true.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
You know, this sticky thing tastes awful.
How do I know...? I couldn't be bothered to take it off during lunchtime, and... let's stop here.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Upsides, you ask... Check this out. The wings glow. Don't have to turn on the lights at night. I guess that's the one upside it has.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Weirdly enough... while it drags my mood down to the bottom of the barrel, it's not actually as heavy as it looks.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Ahah! ...L-Leave me alone, please... Haah, I keep laughing like drunkards ever since I put this on. It sucks.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: ...How many times do you have to ask? I can't fly. I mean, look how small these wings are, and... Haah, forget it.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Mmm... A glass of fairy wine... What makes me keep saying this stuff? Manager! You know the answer, right?!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
I still don't know why I have to use this thing... but, it does get more familiar as I keep using it.
No! I am NOT talking about this jelly-like thing, I specifically mean the weapon!

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Oh, joy... I get recognition for this nonsense... Not sure how I should feel about it.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Haah... I don't even feel like sitting, this thing sticks to chairs if I try...

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Let's go free some technology. I'm not too used to this, so... I might be a bit slow.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Ugh... It's gooey.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Not in the mood, please make it short.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Here I go!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: A toast! ...I mean, a clean hit, right?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Bwegh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Knocked out by the booze.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Bah... You had to keep being sticky... to the bitter end...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Observing with gluey tenacity paid off.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Ugh, it's this thing's fault for getting in the way.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Phew. That's dealt with somehow. ...This will help free more technologies, right?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Ahah! Now that that's done, let's drink some fairy... Oh, there I go again with the twaddle... Let's get back.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Damn it... We've failed to liberate. Nothing is working out.
